00014 #ifndef BUFFERRECEIVER_H

00016 
00017 #include "TimedSelectable.h"
00018 #include "SimpleArray.h"
00019 #include <memory>
00020 
00021 class TCPSocket;
00025 class BufferReceiver: public TimedSelectable {
00026 public:
00027    typedef SimpleArray<byte> BufferType;
00028 
00030    enum State { 
00031       RECEIVING, //< receiving buffer
00032       ERROR, //< something whent wrong with send or connect
00033       IDLE, //< a buffer has been received and ready
00034       DONE //< all received
00035    };
00036 
00041    explicit BufferReceiver( TCPSocket* receiver );
00042 
00043    virtual ~BufferReceiver();
00044 
00049    void receive();
00050 
00052    State getState() const;
00053 
00060    void getBuffer( BufferType& buffer );
00061 
00063    selectable getSelectable() const;
00064 
00065    bool wantRead() const;
00066    bool wantWrite() const;
00067    void handleIO( bool readyRead, bool readyWrite );
00068    void handleTimeout();
00069 
00070 private:
00071    struct Impl;   
00072    std::auto_ptr<Impl> m_impl; //< hidden implementation
00073 };
